sourcesContent:
import React, { useRef, useState } from "react"; import "../styles/tour-detail.css"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import { Container, Row, Col, Form, ListGroup } from "reactstrap"; import tourData from "../assets/data/tours"; import Booking from "../components/Booking/Booking"; import avatar from "../assets/images/avatar.jpg"; import Newsletter from "../shared/Newsletter"; const TourDetails = () => { const { id } = useParams(); const reviewMsgRef = useRef(); const [tourRating, setTourRating] = useState(0); const tour = tourData.find((tour) => tour.id == id); const { photo, title, desc, avgRating, price, reviews, city, distance, maxGroupSize, } = tour; const submitReview = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const reviewtext = reviewMsgRef.current.value; console.log(reviewtext, "with rating", tourRating); }; return ( <>

{title}

$ {price} /per person{" "}

{" "} {avgRating}{" "} Somewhere
{city} {price} / per person {distance} k/m {maxGroupSize} people
Decription

{desc}

{/* Tour review section */}

Reviews ({reviews?.length} reviews)

setTourRating(1)}> 1 setTourRating(2)}> 2 setTourRating(3)}> 3 setTourRating(4)}> 4 setTourRating(5)}> 5
{reviews?.map((review) => (
{review.name}

{new Date().toDateString()}

{review.rating}
Amazing Tour
))}
); }; export default TourDetails;
